segments.text: Want to meet for lunch this Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I can ’ t . I ’ m busy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I always do volunteer work on the first Saturday of every month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I help out at the children ’ s hospital . I help plan activities .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . It ’ s exciting . This month we ’ re doing crossword puzzles .
segments.speaker: S2
